attributes.action: make NHS service more available to all; more flexible practice hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With most of society working 9-5 gaining access to a dentist and a doctor is the most difficult task in existance. I want the government to make sure that within each NHS area at least some Doctors, Dentists and Pharmacies offer late opening hours and also early morning surgeries. Furthermore, we have a right to have access to emergency treatment.
